label: 松平春嶽
本: The Meiji Restoration . Stanford University Press . 1972
見出し読み: まつだいら しゅんがく
説明文: (1828-90). Also: Keiei or Yoshinaga. Kamon. lord (Echizen, or Fukui; 320,000 koku; 1838-58). Leader of Hitotsubashi party, then kobu-gattai party. Senior offices in early Meiji government; councillor (Gijo); departmental minister.
